Texts.Chs: 把10份^orange;甲醇^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the 10 ^orange;Methanol^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 所以，你现在有^orange;物质萃取器^reset;或^orange;研磨机^reset;，但不确定能用它来干嘛？其实很简单。把它放置在某地，扔大概10个^green;原木^reset;到里面。用它们制造2份^orange;甲醇^reset;。
Texts.Eng: So you now have an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; or ^orange;Hand Mill^reset;, but aren't sure what to do with it? It's simple, really. Go place it somewhere, and toss a bunch of ^green;logs^reset; in there. 10 should do. Create 2 ^orange;Methanol^reset; with them.

Texts.Chs: 老哥, 这就是如何制造^orange;甲醇^reset;的方法。现在我们试试用^orange;鹅卵石^reset;！
Texts.Eng: That, my friend, is how you make ^orange;Methanol^reset;. Now let's move on to ^orange;Cobblestone^reset;!
